steps.plaintext: Look for the two keys to the gunpowder storehouse (0/2)
steps.markdown: Look for the two keys to the gunpowder storehouse (0/2)

substeps.plaintext: Storehouse Security Key No. 1: The southern key is in a pot on top of a water-filtration device.
substeps.markdown: ◀Storehouse Security Key No. 1▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Storehouse_Security_Key_No._1▷: The southern key is in a pot on top of a water-filtration device.

substeps.plaintext: Storehouse Security Key No. 2: The northern key is in a dig spot near the tent. Digging will reveal a barrel. Hitting the barrel will damage the player and reveal the key. A shield or a ranged attack can be used to avoid damage.
substeps.markdown: ◀Storehouse Security Key No. 2▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Storehouse_Security_Key_No._2▷: The northern key is in a dig spot near the tent. Digging will reveal a barrel. Hitting the barrel will damage the player and reveal the key. A shield or a ranged attack can be used to avoid damage.

substeps.plaintext: Near the tent is a passage that allows the player to move up to the surface where there will be a Luxurious Chest and a gate. Opening the gate will grant the Wonders of the World achievement "All We Need Is Some Firewood and Some Vinegar..." After moving up, the player can use the passage again to move back down to where they were before.
substeps.markdown: Near the tent is a passage that allows the player to move up to the surface where there will be a ◀Luxurious Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Luxurious_Chest▷ and a gate. Opening the gate will grant the ◀Wonders of the World▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wonders_of_the_World▷ achievement ◀"All We Need Is Some Firewood and Some Vinegar..."▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22All_We_Need_Is_Some_Firewood_and_Some_Vinegar...%22▷ After moving up, the player can use the passage again to move back down to where they were before.

steps.plaintext: Go to open the door to the gunpowder storehouse
steps.markdown: Go to open the door to the gunpowder storehouse

steps.plaintext: Bring the cannonball back to the camp
steps.markdown: Bring the cannonball back to the camp

substeps.plaintext: Each oil requires Cor Lapis x2 and Frog x2.
substeps.markdown: Each oil requires ◀Cor Lapis▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cor_Lapis▷ x2 and ◀Frog▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Frog_(Material)▷ x2.

steps.plaintext: Give the Special Unmoving Essential Oils to Clitopho
steps.markdown: Give the Special Unmoving Essential Oils to Clitopho

substeps.plaintext: Completion of this step reveals the map areas for The Serpent's Cave and Underground Waterway.
substeps.markdown: Completion of this step reveals the map areas for ◀The Serpent's Cave▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Serpent%27s_Cave▷ and ◀Underground Waterway▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Underground_Waterway▷.

steps.plaintext: Release the safety on the cannon's breech
steps.markdown: Release the safety on the cannon's breech

substeps.plaintext: This step can be completed as soon as the Main Mining Area becomes available during Chasm Spelunkers.
substeps.markdown: This step can be completed as soon as the Main Mining Area becomes available during ◀Chasm Spelunkers▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chasm_Spelunkers▷.

substeps.plaintext: Near the Teleport Waypoint, there is a spot where the player can observe the locations of the lamps.
substeps.markdown: Near the Teleport Waypoint, there is a spot where the player can observe the locations of the lamps.◀▶◁https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gensin-impact/images/9/98/World_Quest_The_Heavenly_Stone%27s_Debris_Detail_Image_1.png/revision/latest?cb=20220330185547▷

substeps.plaintext: Activating a lamp will make it pulse at a certain frequency (speed). The lamp will be in the "low frequency" setting when first activated. After activating the lamp, the player can toggle it between these two settings: "low frequency" and "high frequency".
substeps.markdown: Activating a lamp will make it pulse at a certain frequency (speed). The lamp will be in the "low frequency" setting when first activated. After activating the lamp, the player can toggle it between these two settings: "low frequency" and "high frequency".

substeps.plaintext: There are three lamps that must be set in this configuration: "Low lamp post, high-frequency flicker." "Middle lamp post, low-frequency flicker." "High lamp post, low-frequency flicker.".
substeps.markdown: There are three lamps that must be set in this configuration: "Low lamp post, high-frequency flicker." "Middle lamp post, low-frequency flicker." "High lamp post, low-frequency flicker."◀▶◁https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gensin-impact/images/d/d9/World_Quest_The_Heavenly_Stone%27s_Debris_Detail_Image_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20240609023224▷.

substeps.plaintext: When the frequencies have all been correctly set, the lamps will emit a steady glow and can no longer be interacted with.
substeps.markdown: When the frequencies have all been correctly set, the lamps will emit a steady glow and can no longer be interacted with.

steps.plaintext: Load the cannonball in together with Zhiqiong
steps.markdown: Load the cannonball in together with Zhiqiong

steps.plaintext: Use the great cannon to destroy the sealing rocks
steps.markdown: Use ◀the great cannon▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mountainator▷ to destroy the sealing rocks

substeps.plaintext: Cannon alignment: left once, down twice.
substeps.markdown: Cannon alignment: left once, down twice.

substeps.plaintext: Completing this step grants the Wonders of the World achievement Maintain Safety Distance.
substeps.markdown: Completing this step grants the ◀Wonders of the World▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wonders_of_the_World▷ achievement ◀Maintain Safety Distance▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Maintain_Safety_Distance▷.

substeps.plaintext: Completion of this step reveals part of the map area for Stony Halls.
substeps.markdown: Completion of this step reveals part of the map area for ◀Stony Halls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stony_Halls▷.

substeps.plaintext: The player must upgrade their Lumenstone Adjuvant to at least level 2 to complete this step.
substeps.markdown: The player must upgrade their ◀Lumenstone Adjuvant▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Lumenstone_Adjuvant▷ to at least level 2 to complete this step.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Lumenstone Adjuvant next to the Oozing Concretions, not next to the mechanisms.
substeps.markdown: Use the Lumenstone Adjuvant next to the ◀Oozing Concretions▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Oozing_Concretions▷, not next to the mechanisms.

substeps.plaintext: At the west mechanism, the following enemy must be defeated:
substeps.markdown: At the west mechanism, the following enemy must be defeated:

substeps.plaintext: Shadowy Husk: Standard Bearer x1
substeps.markdown: <img:shadowy_husk_standard_bearer> ◀Shadowy Husk: Standard Bearer▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Shadowy_Husk:_Standard_Bearer▷ x1

substeps.plaintext: Each mechanism requires 3 energy from the Lumenstone Adjuvant in order to recharge. Concentrated Lumenstone Energy can be used to recharge the Lumenstone Adjuvant and is found throughout the area. There is also a Ruin Brazier near the south mechanism.
substeps.markdown: Each mechanism requires 3 energy from the Lumenstone Adjuvant in order to recharge. ◀Concentrated Lumenstone Energy▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Concentrated_Lumenstone_Energy▷ can be used to recharge the Lumenstone Adjuvant and is found throughout the area. There is also a ◀Ruin Brazier▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ruin_Brazier▷ near the south mechanism.

substeps.plaintext: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents x1
substeps.markdown: <img:abyss_herald_wicked_torrents> ◀Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Abyss_Herald:_Wicked_Torrents▷ x1

substeps.plaintext: Completing this step unlocks access to Nameless Ruins and The Glowing Narrows.
substeps.markdown: Completing this step unlocks access to ◀Nameless Ruins▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Nameless_Ruins▷ and ◀The Glowing Narrows▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Glowing_Narrows▷.
